text: dubizzle an OLX company|Dubai|Full-Time/ONSITE| dubizzle is the leading classifieds platform in the Middle East, with over 280 employees belonging to 40 different nationalities we hire globally. We are looking for engineers to come in and make a real impact on what already is a great team. Our open roles are listed below https://www.olxgroup.com/search/engineering/uae-dubai/all-br... Python Engineers Full Stack Engineers Senior Test Automation Front End engineers DevOps Engineers. Come join our fun culture and be part of a great team that's building a great product.
